skills.name: Death Gaze
skills.description: [SP: 24][CD: 18s] Unleashes a narrow-angle frontal sweeping laser blast that deals multiple hits and inflicts 87 Fire DMG per hit. Hit enemies then explode, dealing 712 Fire DMG to surrounding enemies in a small AOE and igniting them, dealing 87 Fire DMG every 0.5s for 3s.

skills.name: Thermal Power
skills.description: Attacks deal an additional 94 Fire DMG.
